name: Tangie
description: Tangie is another fantastic offering from DNA Genetics in Amsterdam that has quickly gained popularity in its home and is spreading elsewhere. This strain is a remake of sorts of the popular version of Tangerine Dream that was sought-after in the 1990s. The genetics on this strain are a cross of California Orange and a Skunk hybrid, and its citrus heritage is the most evident in its refreshing tangerine aroma. As a plant, Tangie grows best outside, producing sticky buds that provide euphoric yet relaxed effects.
descriptionPlain: Tangie is another fantastic offering from DNA Genetics in Amsterdam that has quickly gained popularity in its home and is spreading elsewhere. This strain is a remake of sorts of the popular version of Tangerine Dream that was sought-after in the 1990s. The genetics on this strain are a cross of California Orange and a Skunk hybrid, and its citrus heritage is the most evident in its refreshing tangerine aroma. As a plant, Tangie grows best outside, producing sticky buds that provide euphoric yet relaxed effects.

highlightedReviews.text:
It's a creeper! Took 10+ minutes before full effects became really noticeable. Extremely clear-headed and capable. The sativa raciness in your chest feels like juicy fruit (not the gum lol). It's got a fizzy tingle; like seltzer water carbonation. 

Entire body's noticeably relaxed and totally at ease. Strong, feel good medicative powers there.

Very cool, zen-like head space. Starting to feel motivated and creative. Ease of focus and clarity make it great for working. Less a "gone" high and more of a distant one. Perfect for day use, getting stuff done, making art, and loving nature.

Seriously, make an effort to go outside. You'll be blown away by the inherent beauty of nature just like tripping on shrooms. Similarly, it's not the most stable high, with some edginess that makes it feel like an adventure.

Mostly uplifting and for a long time. A slight numbing helps lower social inhibitions while the shroomy emotional state connects you with people deeply. If any strain should have it's flavor commended, it must be this one! It stupefyingly tastes like tangerines. Not oranges, not "citrus", just straight motherfucking tangerines. Unbelievable.

Super smooth and pungent as a live rosin. Its color is a beautiful bright orange with a hint of umber. Smelling just like tangerines this oil is also sweet. Overall the high is mellow and really chill. Stupid heavy eyes though. lmao

articles.title: Leafly’s Faves 2017: Concentrates
articles.author: Leafly Staff
articles.text:
Leafly’s Faves is a series providing a glimpse into the strains, products, and brands that our team of cannabis aficionados is buying, consuming, and enjoying the most every year. Some are entirely new to the market, while others are simply perennial favorites that we can’t recommend enough. Below, find our crew’s favorite cannabis concentrates of 2017. How many have you tried? What was your favorite concentrate of 2017? Share with us in the comments below!

Double Tangie Banana Sugar Resin by Oleum Extracts
Available in: Washington
Bursting with citrus aroma, Oleum Extracts’ delicious Double Tangie Banana Sugar Resin brings maximum flavor along with buzzy sativa-dominant qualities. We love it for its huge terpene profile, and find it to beget a subtle, controllable high with each and every dab.
Space Queen Cartridge by Artizen Cannabis
Available in: Washington
Notes of bold cherry mixed with a soft vanilla scent are found in Artizen’s hybrid Space Queen Cartridge. We recommend this delectable concentrate for beginners and newbies as it delivers a well-balanced high and sweet taste that will keep you (and us) coming back for more.
Harley Twin CBD Sap by Cannavative
Available in: Nevada
Packed with 57.6mg CBD to 23.3mg THC, we’re loving Cannavative’s pain-crushing Harley Twin CBD Sap. Wrap yourself in a stimulating buzz with a healthy dab of this sativa strain before taking on the day.

CHILL Cartridge by SuicideGirls Cannabis
Available in: California
The Suicide Girls released a line of effects-based cartridges that will perfectly match your mood, and we’ve been getting up close and personal with their relaxing CHILL Cartridge filled with a whopping 80% THC and mouthwatering fruity terpenes.
Also featured in: We Tried the Suicide Girls’ New Cannabis Vape Line
Green Crack Distillate Cartridge by Bullet Concentrates
Available in: Nevada
Bullet Concentrates’ Silver Bullet Distillate Cartridges are as effective as they are elevating, and the Green Crack Cartridge is no exception. We’ve been including it as part of a balanced wake and bake morning for its burst of energy and robust terpene profile.
THCA Crystalline Distillate by Oleum Extracts
Available in: Washington
Oleum Extracts comes up time and again when we talk great local concentrates, and their potent THCA Crystalline Distillate is a favorite amongst our more experienced concentrate lovers. When pressed on a hot dab nail, THCA decarboxylates into strong and active THC. With little to no terpene content in a crystalline distillate, the rush is smooth and tasteless, and these crystals can be added to standard dabs for an intense high-potency experience (trust us, it’ll feel like you’re taking your first dab all over again).

Tropical Trainwreck 1g Kit by Orchid Essentials
Available in: California and Oregon
Leafly’s office is located in Seattle, which means we clamor for any product that lets us escape from the clouds and rain. Enter the Tropical Trainwreck Cartridge Kit by Orchid Essentials, loaded with tropical terpenes boasting citrus and pineapple flavors. It’s as close to sitting on a sunny beach as we can get.
FreshTerps by Evolab
Available in: Colorado
Evolab’s FreshTerps is a step up in the world of cannabis flavors and aroma. We’ve fallen head over heels for this concentrate, which contains about 90% terpenes (plus 10% THC) and can be vaped individually or blended with your favorite oils to produce the most delicious dabs you’ve ever had.
Also featured in: Best Products to Pick Up Before 4/20
Eureka Clear Disposable Vape Pen in Indica by Eureka Vapor
Available in: California and Colorado
With 300mg of cannabinoids, Eureka’s calming Disposable Vape Pen has our indica lovers singing its praises. Featuring classic indica strains like Granddaddy Purple and Skywalker and a full test analysis for each pen, we admire Eureka Vapor’s attention to quality and ease of use.
Also featured in: 10 Brands Making Awesome Disposable Cannabis Vape Pens

Red Apple Clear Cartridge by The Clear
Available in: California, Colorado, and Oregon
The Clear brings the sweet and crisp fragrance of a fresh apple orchard right to your lips with their half-gram Red Apple Clear Cartridge. We can also get down with The Clear’s other cartridges featuring a wide range of delicious flavors (once you’re done with Red Apple, try the lush Orange Cream).
Also featured in: In Photos: These ‘Dragon Balls’ Contain 3,000 Grams of Pure Cannabis Oil
Chemmy Jones Blonde BHO by Dorado Extracts
Available in: Washington
Dorado Extracts’ extra-terpy Chemmy Jones Blonde BHO provides an ultra-rich taste with a high-energy buzz. We especially love their innovative soft lid packaging and quality concentrate at a budget-friendly price point.
Also featured in: What Are Your Smoking? Episode 17
Super Lemon Haze Vape Cartridge by The Bloom Brand
Available in: California and Washington
Free of solvents, lipids, waxes, and impurities, The Bloom Brand’s Super Lemon Haze Vape Cartridges are triple distilled and contain only oil and terpenes, giving you an ultra-pure cannabis concentrate.
Lead image by rgbspace/iStock

articles.title: The 13 Best Cannabis Strains for Parties
articles.author: Brett Konen
articles.text:
A lot of people think of alcohol as the classic social lubricant. For some of us, it is. Alcohol can loosen us up, make us chatty and animated, and wash away social anxiety. It’s also often readily available at social occasions. Meanwhile, many people avoid cannabis use during social events—for one thing, it’s generally not served, and for another, many can recall a time cannabis made them paranoid or sleepy at a party, and don’t want to have that happen again.

Luckily, with the right strains you can avoid the unwanted effects mentioned above. We used the advanced filters in Leafly’s strain explorer to get started, sorting to include strains with the happiest, most talkative highs, and to exclude any strains that make users anxious, paranoid, or sleepy. (If only alcohol’s drawbacks were so easy to filter out, am I right?)
We’ve curated the resultant list with our in-house expertise, vetting all suggestions against our own experiences and ensuring there’s a pick for every type of party. Attendees heading to any social occasion will find something below.
And the awards for the best party cannabis strains go to…
Chocolope
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: All occasions.
DNA Genetics developed Chocolope by crossing Chocolate Thai with Cannalope Haze to create their homage to the super-popular Chocolate strains of the 1980s. The hefty sativa buds give earthy, sweet coffee flavors that provide a dreamy, cerebral effect. It’s known around the Leafly office as “the party strain,” and for good reason—it’s basically impossible to be unhappy or introverted with such a feel-good high.

White Russian
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Dinner parties.
Originally created by Dutch breeders Serious Seeds, White Russian is a cross of two legendary strains, White Widow and AK-47. An indica-dominant hybrid, it won the High Times Cannabis Cup “Best Overall” in 1996. White Russian is an extremely fragrant plant, and with a flavor that is smooth and spicy with undertones of skunk and earth, and its high is quite cerebral (especially for an indica-dominant strain), making it great for conversation with those around you.
Tangie
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Cocktail parties.
Another fave among the Leafly crew, particularly for group gatherings after work, Tangie is a fantastic offering from DNA Genetics in Amsterdam. This strain is a remake of sorts of the popular version of Tangerine Dream that was sought-after in the 1990s, with genetics derived from a cross of California Orange and a Skunk hybrid. Its citrus heritage is the most evident in its refreshing tangerine aroma.
Blue Goo
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Friends and family gatherings.
Blue Goo is a sativa-dominant hybrid that’s a cross between the famous hybrid Blue Dream and indica Afgoo. A moderate to high potency yields uplifting effects that are standard for sativas, but not excessively energetic thanks to Afgoo’s contribution as well as the mellow nature of Blue Dream. This strain is appropriate for day or nighttime consumption and provides smooth smoke and berry flavor.

Sour Lemon OG
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Birthday parties.
Bred by Emerald Triangle Seeds, Sour Lemon OG is a sativa-dominant hybrid cross between California Sour and Lemon OG. This 65% sativa strain is named after its aromatic sour smell with recognizable notes of lemon, lime, and apple. Sour Lemon OG elevates the mind and body simultaneously, making this a natural go-to strain for celebrations, social engagements, or even just a busy day.
Blue Diesel
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Happy hour.
Daughter of indica-dominant Blueberry and sativa-dominant NYC Diesel, Blue Diesel (also known as Blue City Diesel) falls slightly on the indica side of things with a pleasant, moderate- to long-lasting body buzz (perfect if you want to extend the happy for more than an hour). Thanks to its Blueberry genetics, this flower emanates a light berry aroma that is smooth, expansive, and fast-acting. This strain is optimal for daytime use, and relaxes the consumer in social settings without putting you to sleep.
Pez
Strain type: Indica
Best for: Cannabis-focused parties.
Pez is an indica daughter of Afghani and Pakistani strains. These sweet, frosty buds offer the relaxation typical of indicas without the drowsiness, making the strain great for daytime use. We recommend this one as a shareable contribution to any 420-friendly gathering—it’s also on our list of the Top 100 Must-Try Strains, meaning it will be a particularly popular addition to any event with open cannabis consumption.

Orange Bud
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Hosting.
Matching plenty of social energy with a dose of subtle relaxation, this strain is perfect for gatherings where you’re in charge and want to stay upbeat and level-headed. First bred in 1980s by Dutch Passion, Orange Bud is a combination of two members of the 100% Skunk family. With bright orange hairs coating the surface, it showcases scents of orange and nectarine.
Blueberry Headband
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Parties you don’t want to attend.
Several renditions of the Blueberry Headband hybrid are known to exist, but the original Blueberry Headband from NorCal’s Emerald Triangle Seeds is the most well-known. It’s a 50/50 indica-sativa hybrid that smells of diesel, berries and pepper, and it produces a perfectly balanced high with a nice cerebral rush and relaxing body effects. This is great for staying sufficiently present while mentally floating high above any social event you wish you didn’t have to attend (think work parties, baby showers, and so on).
Banana Kush
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Potlucks.
This legendary West Coast strain crosses Ghost OG and Skunk Haze to create an indica-dominant hybrid that tastes and smells like a bushel of fresh bananas (and will whet your appetite if there’s food around). Although it leans towards an indica genetically, the effects are balanced by the Haze’s mellow sativa buzz that provides a relaxed sense of euphoria. Banana Kush also help its consumers remain talkative in social settings.

Durban Cookies
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Loud parties.
Durban Cookies is the Durban Poison-dominant phenotype of GSC. Known for its invigorating mental energy and body buzz, Durban Cookies offers a more energizing experience, making this sativa-dominant strain a top choice throughout the day and into the evening, particularly if you’re headed to a high-energy event where you’ll be surrounded by music, people, and movement.
Bubblegum Kush
Strain type: Indica
Best for: Low-key get-togethers.
This strain is for laid-back social situations; it’ll leave you relaxed and comfy on any given couch, but also chatty and ready to hang with whoever sits down next to you. An 80% indica strain from Bulldog Seeds in the Netherlands, Bubblegum Kush is a cross between Bubble Gum and an undisclosed Kush, and has a satisfyingly sour smell and flavor.
Strawberry
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Being a plus-one.
Originally bred in the Netherlands, Strawberry is a mostly sativa cannabis strain with a pungent fruity scent and uplifting effects. Consumers prone to anxiety choose Strawberry for its stress-relieving qualities without the jarring paranoia common among high-THC strains (which makes it great for small talk with people you don’t know). Comfortable and relaxing, Strawberry brings with it a hearty dose of physical and mental ease.

It's a creeper! Took 10+ minutes before full effects became really noticeable. Extremely clear-headed and capable. The sativa raciness in your chest feels like juicy fruit (not the gum lol). It's got a fizzy tingle; like seltzer water carbonation. 

Entire body's noticeably relaxed and totally at ease. Strong, feel good medicative powers there.

Very cool, zen-like head space. Starting to feel motivated and creative. Ease of focus and clarity make it great for working. Less a "gone" high and more of a distant one. Perfect for day use, getting stuff done, making art, and loving nature.

Seriously, make an effort to go outside. You'll be blown away by the inherent beauty of nature just like tripping on shrooms. Similarly, it's not the most stable high, with some edginess that makes it feel like an adventure.

Mostly uplifting and for a long time. A slight numbing helps lower social inhibitions while the shroomy emotional state connects you with people deeply. If any strain should have it's flavor commended, it must be this one! It stupefyingly tastes like tangerines. Not oranges, not "citrus", just straight motherfucking tangerines. Unbelievable.

Super smooth and pungent as a live rosin. Its color is a beautiful bright orange with a hint of umber. Smelling just like tangerines this oil is also sweet. Overall the high is mellow and really chill. Stupid heavy eyes though. lmao

articles.title: Leafly’s Faves 2017: Concentrates
articles.author: Leafly Staff
articles.text:
Leafly’s Faves is a series providing a glimpse into the strains, products, and brands that our team of cannabis aficionados is buying, consuming, and enjoying the most every year. Some are entirely new to the market, while others are simply perennial favorites that we can’t recommend enough. Below, find our crew’s favorite cannabis concentrates of 2017. How many have you tried? What was your favorite concentrate of 2017? Share with us in the comments below!

Double Tangie Banana Sugar Resin by Oleum Extracts
Available in: Washington
Bursting with citrus aroma, Oleum Extracts’ delicious Double Tangie Banana Sugar Resin brings maximum flavor along with buzzy sativa-dominant qualities. We love it for its huge terpene profile, and find it to beget a subtle, controllable high with each and every dab.
Space Queen Cartridge by Artizen Cannabis
Available in: Washington
Notes of bold cherry mixed with a soft vanilla scent are found in Artizen’s hybrid Space Queen Cartridge. We recommend this delectable concentrate for beginners and newbies as it delivers a well-balanced high and sweet taste that will keep you (and us) coming back for more.
Harley Twin CBD Sap by Cannavative
Available in: Nevada
Packed with 57.6mg CBD to 23.3mg THC, we’re loving Cannavative’s pain-crushing Harley Twin CBD Sap. Wrap yourself in a stimulating buzz with a healthy dab of this sativa strain before taking on the day.

CHILL Cartridge by SuicideGirls Cannabis
Available in: California
The Suicide Girls released a line of effects-based cartridges that will perfectly match your mood, and we’ve been getting up close and personal with their relaxing CHILL Cartridge filled with a whopping 80% THC and mouthwatering fruity terpenes.
Also featured in: We Tried the Suicide Girls’ New Cannabis Vape Line
Green Crack Distillate Cartridge by Bullet Concentrates
Available in: Nevada
Bullet Concentrates’ Silver Bullet Distillate Cartridges are as effective as they are elevating, and the Green Crack Cartridge is no exception. We’ve been including it as part of a balanced wake and bake morning for its burst of energy and robust terpene profile.
THCA Crystalline Distillate by Oleum Extracts
Available in: Washington
Oleum Extracts comes up time and again when we talk great local concentrates, and their potent THCA Crystalline Distillate is a favorite amongst our more experienced concentrate lovers. When pressed on a hot dab nail, THCA decarboxylates into strong and active THC. With little to no terpene content in a crystalline distillate, the rush is smooth and tasteless, and these crystals can be added to standard dabs for an intense high-potency experience (trust us, it’ll feel like you’re taking your first dab all over again).

Tropical Trainwreck 1g Kit by Orchid Essentials
Available in: California and Oregon
Leafly’s office is located in Seattle, which means we clamor for any product that lets us escape from the clouds and rain. Enter the Tropical Trainwreck Cartridge Kit by Orchid Essentials, loaded with tropical terpenes boasting citrus and pineapple flavors. It’s as close to sitting on a sunny beach as we can get.
FreshTerps by Evolab
Available in: Colorado
Evolab’s FreshTerps is a step up in the world of cannabis flavors and aroma. We’ve fallen head over heels for this concentrate, which contains about 90% terpenes (plus 10% THC) and can be vaped individually or blended with your favorite oils to produce the most delicious dabs you’ve ever had.
Also featured in: Best Products to Pick Up Before 4/20
Eureka Clear Disposable Vape Pen in Indica by Eureka Vapor
Available in: California and Colorado
With 300mg of cannabinoids, Eureka’s calming Disposable Vape Pen has our indica lovers singing its praises. Featuring classic indica strains like Granddaddy Purple and Skywalker and a full test analysis for each pen, we admire Eureka Vapor’s attention to quality and ease of use.
Also featured in: 10 Brands Making Awesome Disposable Cannabis Vape Pens

Red Apple Clear Cartridge by The Clear
Available in: California, Colorado, and Oregon
The Clear brings the sweet and crisp fragrance of a fresh apple orchard right to your lips with their half-gram Red Apple Clear Cartridge. We can also get down with The Clear’s other cartridges featuring a wide range of delicious flavors (once you’re done with Red Apple, try the lush Orange Cream).
Also featured in: In Photos: These ‘Dragon Balls’ Contain 3,000 Grams of Pure Cannabis Oil
Chemmy Jones Blonde BHO by Dorado Extracts
Available in: Washington
Dorado Extracts’ extra-terpy Chemmy Jones Blonde BHO provides an ultra-rich taste with a high-energy buzz. We especially love their innovative soft lid packaging and quality concentrate at a budget-friendly price point.
Also featured in: What Are Your Smoking? Episode 17
Super Lemon Haze Vape Cartridge by The Bloom Brand
Available in: California and Washington
Free of solvents, lipids, waxes, and impurities, The Bloom Brand’s Super Lemon Haze Vape Cartridges are triple distilled and contain only oil and terpenes, giving you an ultra-pure cannabis concentrate.
Lead image by rgbspace/iStock

articles.title: The 13 Best Cannabis Strains for Parties
articles.author: Brett Konen
articles.text:
A lot of people think of alcohol as the classic social lubricant. For some of us, it is. Alcohol can loosen us up, make us chatty and animated, and wash away social anxiety. It’s also often readily available at social occasions. Meanwhile, many people avoid cannabis use during social events—for one thing, it’s generally not served, and for another, many can recall a time cannabis made them paranoid or sleepy at a party, and don’t want to have that happen again.

Luckily, with the right strains you can avoid the unwanted effects mentioned above. We used the advanced filters in Leafly’s strain explorer to get started, sorting to include strains with the happiest, most talkative highs, and to exclude any strains that make users anxious, paranoid, or sleepy. (If only alcohol’s drawbacks were so easy to filter out, am I right?)
We’ve curated the resultant list with our in-house expertise, vetting all suggestions against our own experiences and ensuring there’s a pick for every type of party. Attendees heading to any social occasion will find something below.
And the awards for the best party cannabis strains go to…
Chocolope
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: All occasions.
DNA Genetics developed Chocolope by crossing Chocolate Thai with Cannalope Haze to create their homage to the super-popular Chocolate strains of the 1980s. The hefty sativa buds give earthy, sweet coffee flavors that provide a dreamy, cerebral effect. It’s known around the Leafly office as “the party strain,” and for good reason—it’s basically impossible to be unhappy or introverted with such a feel-good high.

White Russian
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Dinner parties.
Originally created by Dutch breeders Serious Seeds, White Russian is a cross of two legendary strains, White Widow and AK-47. An indica-dominant hybrid, it won the High Times Cannabis Cup “Best Overall” in 1996. White Russian is an extremely fragrant plant, and with a flavor that is smooth and spicy with undertones of skunk and earth, and its high is quite cerebral (especially for an indica-dominant strain), making it great for conversation with those around you.
Tangie
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Cocktail parties.
Another fave among the Leafly crew, particularly for group gatherings after work, Tangie is a fantastic offering from DNA Genetics in Amsterdam. This strain is a remake of sorts of the popular version of Tangerine Dream that was sought-after in the 1990s, with genetics derived from a cross of California Orange and a Skunk hybrid. Its citrus heritage is the most evident in its refreshing tangerine aroma.
Blue Goo
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Friends and family gatherings.
Blue Goo is a sativa-dominant hybrid that’s a cross between the famous hybrid Blue Dream and indica Afgoo. A moderate to high potency yields uplifting effects that are standard for sativas, but not excessively energetic thanks to Afgoo’s contribution as well as the mellow nature of Blue Dream. This strain is appropriate for day or nighttime consumption and provides smooth smoke and berry flavor.

Sour Lemon OG
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Birthday parties.
Bred by Emerald Triangle Seeds, Sour Lemon OG is a sativa-dominant hybrid cross between California Sour and Lemon OG. This 65% sativa strain is named after its aromatic sour smell with recognizable notes of lemon, lime, and apple. Sour Lemon OG elevates the mind and body simultaneously, making this a natural go-to strain for celebrations, social engagements, or even just a busy day.
Blue Diesel
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Happy hour.
Daughter of indica-dominant Blueberry and sativa-dominant NYC Diesel, Blue Diesel (also known as Blue City Diesel) falls slightly on the indica side of things with a pleasant, moderate- to long-lasting body buzz (perfect if you want to extend the happy for more than an hour). Thanks to its Blueberry genetics, this flower emanates a light berry aroma that is smooth, expansive, and fast-acting. This strain is optimal for daytime use, and relaxes the consumer in social settings without putting you to sleep.
Pez
Strain type: Indica
Best for: Cannabis-focused parties.
Pez is an indica daughter of Afghani and Pakistani strains. These sweet, frosty buds offer the relaxation typical of indicas without the drowsiness, making the strain great for daytime use. We recommend this one as a shareable contribution to any 420-friendly gathering—it’s also on our list of the Top 100 Must-Try Strains, meaning it will be a particularly popular addition to any event with open cannabis consumption.

Orange Bud
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Hosting.
Matching plenty of social energy with a dose of subtle relaxation, this strain is perfect for gatherings where you’re in charge and want to stay upbeat and level-headed. First bred in 1980s by Dutch Passion, Orange Bud is a combination of two members of the 100% Skunk family. With bright orange hairs coating the surface, it showcases scents of orange and nectarine.
Blueberry Headband
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Parties you don’t want to attend.
Several renditions of the Blueberry Headband hybrid are known to exist, but the original Blueberry Headband from NorCal’s Emerald Triangle Seeds is the most well-known. It’s a 50/50 indica-sativa hybrid that smells of diesel, berries and pepper, and it produces a perfectly balanced high with a nice cerebral rush and relaxing body effects. This is great for staying sufficiently present while mentally floating high above any social event you wish you didn’t have to attend (think work parties, baby showers, and so on).
Banana Kush
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Potlucks.
This legendary West Coast strain crosses Ghost OG and Skunk Haze to create an indica-dominant hybrid that tastes and smells like a bushel of fresh bananas (and will whet your appetite if there’s food around). Although it leans towards an indica genetically, the effects are balanced by the Haze’s mellow sativa buzz that provides a relaxed sense of euphoria. Banana Kush also help its consumers remain talkative in social settings.

Durban Cookies
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Loud parties.
Durban Cookies is the Durban Poison-dominant phenotype of GSC. Known for its invigorating mental energy and body buzz, Durban Cookies offers a more energizing experience, making this sativa-dominant strain a top choice throughout the day and into the evening, particularly if you’re headed to a high-energy event where you’ll be surrounded by music, people, and movement.
Bubblegum Kush
Strain type: Indica
Best for: Low-key get-togethers.
This strain is for laid-back social situations; it’ll leave you relaxed and comfy on any given couch, but also chatty and ready to hang with whoever sits down next to you. An 80% indica strain from Bulldog Seeds in the Netherlands, Bubblegum Kush is a cross between Bubble Gum and an undisclosed Kush, and has a satisfyingly sour smell and flavor.
Strawberry
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Being a plus-one.
Originally bred in the Netherlands, Strawberry is a mostly sativa cannabis strain with a pungent fruity scent and uplifting effects. Consumers prone to anxiety choose Strawberry for its stress-relieving qualities without the jarring paranoia common among high-THC strains (which makes it great for small talk with people you don’t know). Comfortable and relaxing, Strawberry brings with it a hearty dose of physical and mental ease.
